meanings.definition: a person with whom one plays or spends time with for fun
meanings.sent1: My little sister is my favorite playmate.
meanings.sent2: During recess, I always look for a playmate to join me on the swings.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy found a new playmate in the park.
meanings.sent4: Imaginary friends can be great playmates for children.
meanings.sent5: Having a loyal playmate can make any game more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: a companion for play or recreation
meanings.sent1: My dog is my loyal playmate when I go for walks in the park.
meanings.sent2: At the playground, children often find a playmate to share the seesaw with.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten made a toy mouse its playmate.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the backyard became a reliable playmate for generations of kids.
meanings.sent5: A good book can be a wonderful playmate on a lazy afternoon.
